title: PSA: Rito don't play about account sharing
body:
So there was some master tier player. I joked and said "let me have your password so I can see how badly I'd get rekt at your elo". - obvious joke is obvious

Rito coming all in like "ur content was removed and dis is ur only warning, next time we permaban your account".

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/353/279/e31.jpg

replies.body: DUDE I KNOW RIGHT?! SO LIKE THIS ONE TIME THIS TOTALLY HOT AND TOTALLY REAL GIRL SAID "I'll sex u if u giv me ur acount passsword" SO I GAV HER MY PASSSSSWURD AND THE SECOND I SAID MY PASSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSWWWWORD THE TOTALLY REAL AND TOTALLY DEADLY RIOT POLIZE TELEPORTED BE HIND ME AND THEY BANNED ME FOREVER AND EVER, WHICH SUX BECAUSE I WAS CHALLONGE 1 ON MY ACCOUNT :(
Ok, cool, but did you get sex?
Wait, it isn't so simple. Some accounts may cost more than a hooker.
idek how to respond to this
You really should have checked for wards.
_**Phreak teleports behind you**_ nothing personal kid

>"ur content was removed and dis is ur only warning, next time we permaban your account".

How typical of them, making threats. Sounds very Curator-like.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/0d30a3aa7558702a43ce444cc10c2d94/tumblr_nbcr7nXl7c1shiin5o1_1280.jpg
What are the chances that your comment will get removed?

Honest answer? I'm surprised I'm not perma-banned already.
These people can't take criticism. :|
